functions: Run historical validation on trap routes
Score past props against volatility triggers
Log alignment misfires and success rates
Sync with POST-MORTEM and AZORI memory
Tag props for volatility trend analysis
signal_source: POST-MORTEM logs, AZORI archive, overlay filters
description: Historical trap validation node. Compares past props to trap/volatility history, audits alignment patterns, and syncs trend logs to memory.
